attributes.action: create the procedure of ostracism as practised under the ancient Greek Athenian democracy.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Provide the means for the electorate to choose each year whether to hold an ostracism or not, and then to nominate and vote for the exile of a prominent politician or citizen for a period of ten years.

Use any funds generated from TV rights for good causes.
